_sText:
Ze_aftermath_v2

Made by:
Sherlock Holmes[NL]

AKA:
Xyr1c0n[NL]
SnarkY
Spoon7of7doom

About the map:
The objective of the map is to reach the end-point and to stay alive until the explosion kills all the people who didn't
make it. 

There are several barricades where you can hold of the zombies so your team can make progress through the map.

Also I'm not a full-time map creator so don't expect to much of this map, also it's my first zombie escape map so I'm not
sure how balanced everything is.

Enjoy the map and don't use anything without my permision (you can use my map as a example).


New in this version:
-Added various props to make it harder to reach the tram
-Added some new rooms to extend the duration of a round
-Added HDR support
-Added traps
-Added some destructable barricades that block doors
-Made some flickering lights non-flickering
-Made the tram-area more easy to defend
-Fixxed some texture problems
-Fixxed some spawnpoints
